item.title: Magic: The Gathering - my first cloud project
item.description: I finished working on my first project and it marks a milestone for me. This project is about ‘Magic: The Gathering’ - a card game created in the early 90s, which I loved to play with my friends. We went from Pok√©mon, to Yu-Gi-Oh! to Warhammer 40k. But Magic, really sticked with us. In this project I went from knowing nothing about cloud and orchestration, to setting up a Google Cloud environment via terraform, orchestrating a data pipeline reading from an API to push data to Google Cloud Storage, to BigQuery, transforming my data with DBT and visualizing my insights in a Looker dashboard.
